#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef vector<int> vi;
int main()
{
	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
	int T,n,m;
	cin>>T;
	for(int t=1;t<=T;t++)
	{
		printf("Case %d:\n",t);
		cin>>n>>m;
		vi v(n);
		double d,dd;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lf",&d);
			//cin>>d;
			v.push_back((int)(d*100+.005));
		}
		sort(v.rbegin(),v.rend());
		for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
			scanf("%lf",&dd);
			//cin>>dd;
			dd=dd*100;
			int x=(int)(dd+.005);
			//cout<<x<<endl;
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				int y=x/v[j];
				if(y>0)
				{
					if(v[j]<100)
					printf("%1.2lf %d\n",(double)v[j]/100.00,y);
					else
					printf("%d %d\n",(int)v[j]/100,y);
					x=x%v[j];
				}
			} 
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
